creditline: .1 (quilt): Minnesota Historical Society Collections, Gift of Mrs. Albert T. Stearns to the Sibley House Association, 1941; .2-6: Minnesota Historical Society Collections, Gift of Mrs. Etta Gerrish Dyar to the Sibley House Association
description: MHS L1997.19.12 and .16; quilt  off-white; four basket designs in various brown fabrics; mattress  tan; pillows  blue and brown stripes; pillow cases  off-white
dimension: .1 (quilt): H.20 x W.20 in.; .2 (mattress): H.15-1/2 x W.9 x D.3/8 in.; .3,4 (pillows): H.5-1/2 x W.2-3/4 in. (each); .5 (pillow case): H.8-1/2 x W.3-3/8 in.; .6 (pillow case): H.6-3/4 x W.3-7/8 in.
title: Toy Quilt with Mattress and Pillows
